Encryption¶

This is a optional step, but has to be chosen to either use or skip in order for the installer to know what to do. If you wish to have luks2 (argon2) encryption, then all you need to do is select a disk password and select Enable Disk Encryption.

If you prefer or can’t use encryption, simply choose Don’t use disk encryption and proceed to the _mirrors step.

Note

This step will not start to format the drive when you select a disk, the _Encryption step.
